705065f-a.title: Brooklyn: Hunt's Alley - Henry Street
705065f-a.text:
(1)
Hunt's Alley, north side, east from Henry Street, showing rear of houses on Remsen Street. In the background, is seen, from left to right, the Montague Court Building, the court Remsen building and another building at
16,26,32 Court Street respectively.
August 10, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, at a later date.
March 27, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
The same, a closer view showing the end of the Alley at the rear of
the Clinton Arms Hotel.
March 27, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
705065f-a.folder: Hunt's Alley & Henry Street, Brooklyn, NY

704841f-a.text:
Henry Street opposite Hunts Lane (formerly Alley).
April 5, 1938.
P. L. Sperr
